post.body: Noted. Will bring a flask and a lethal dose of morphine instead.
going to a trade show next month in times square. can you advise on watering holes there that aren't, like, awful?
Also, Jeanne will be in town. I'll cross my fingers that my family stays on speaking terms for the next two weeks.
Will do. Lemme know if you're still on for Airport Happy Hour Adventure tonight.
International Blues Superstar and time traveler. Try him, you'll like him. Unless you hate fun.
POUR SOME SUGARWATER ON ME
@manuel_mg hint: this person has sugar in their last name too. and also probably their high-top shoes.
And dude I was getting all excited about hating Google. Way to ruin Christmas
yo mr bare cupboard, we got dinosaur-style xmas dinner at Planet Motherfucker tomorrow night. INCREASE THE PEACE
So...it's the chihuahua sort of dog, then.
When do you get into town?
I just bought kale at fred meyer, will bring it tomorrow if you wanna scramble it
I bought a teeeeny potted decorated tree at Walgreens for like $7. Not sure where it'll get planted in spring, though.
Crash space in SE if you need it. I may or may not be here weather permitting, ping @wurmouroboros
Hopefully she is just hunkering down somewhere safe and dry. Mine did for about a day. Little Yeti.
Couch if you need it
BTW living without plastic money sucks. And so does waiting 7 to 10 BUSINESS days for a new debit card.
OK, Airport Adventure Happy Hour is shelved until tomorrow evening. Too much to do this aft to make it to the bank first.
nearly forgot to eat lunch. What is with me today
Awwwwww ♫ http://blip.fm/~16ngo
A Muncie girl. Can you beat that.
rt @misuba anyone in #pdx know a sysadmin-ish person who'd like to bill a few hours' work?
If you do not believe in @BarrySugarwater I can't believe in you.
On a bright, Hawaiian Christmas day: ♫ http://blip.fm/~165fv
Having drinks tonight with a dude who affects an intentional and realistic O-face during karaoke. Um.
working from home. Internet connection only sporadically functioning. Good gravy!
Wants to do xmas karaoke this friday and wants you to join her.
would like to formally resign from Giving a Shit.
Happy Christmas, very much! Headed to @susitna's for brizzunch!
OH YEAH I AM A FREAKING GENIUS
walked and walked and walked and walked today.
Had a dream last night that someone told me this was a terrible song. I wanted to waste them. ♫ http://blip.fm/~1aj96
Nothin says xmas like Ad-rock ♫ http://blip.fm/~1aj5t
"You'll be doin' all right with your Christmas of white." SPEAK FOR YOURSELF ♫ http://blip.fm/~1aj40
Friends and relations send salutations, sure as the stars shine above: ♫ http://blip.fm/~1aj31
Dad snowed in. McCurdy Xmas postponed official.
Flight already slightly delayed. Does not bode well. Checked in and getting up at four.
"If you're wearing a corset, and leggings and high-heeled boots, YOU CAN'T FUCKING RUN FROM THE WOLFMAN." - @kpele
wishes she had a pull sled.
Cash in hand but no debit card until at least the end of this week. I miss the 21st century.
